title: Urwahn Acros EDT opens up gravel roads for no-seattube, 3D-printed steel bike family
content:
Urwahn bikes’ unique 3D-printed steel frame without a seat tube is ready to hit the gravel roads in a new Acros EDT special edition. Widened out to fit proper fast-rolling gravel tires, the wild frame design could just be perfect for smoothing out the chatter of off-road riding, and pairs surprisingly well with a Lauf […]

The post Urwahn Acros EDT opens up gravel roads for no-seattube, 3D-printed steel bike family appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
